Articles.Content:
So I wanted to put floats on Apollo, is there a stock way to make them actually float? I tried creating a new resource and making it super light but it didn't work.

If anyone has any clue as to how flotation works in KSP I would appreciate it....

FASA Beta

http://www./download/6bd2ordoh2d33um/FASA4.99.zip

Edited December 15, 2014 by frizzank

Check out RoverDude's modpack to see if there is any tips:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84359-0-25-USI-Survivability-Pack-%28Formerly-DERP%29-v0-1-3-2014-11-01

There's a stock bug where masses ingame are in tons but KSP tells Unity it's actually kilograms, which makes everything super-buoyant. So don't expect your floats to be more floaty than the capsule...

There's a stock bug where masses ingame are in tons but KSP tells Unity it's actually kilograms, which makes everything super-buoyant. So don't expect your floats to be more floaty than the capsule...

Yea, bugs!!!

Thanks for the help....
